评论详情: This dress was much better quality than I anticipated. Great fit, color true to image.

I wore this dress to an event that honors American Civil War generals. I bought accessories separately including a hoop skirt. My dress did not come with the neck piece, but I wanted to wear personal jewelry anyway. The ribbon lace-in for the back is also not included. I found the dress to be functional and the material quality for the price was good. I’m usually a size small at 5’7” and 125lbs and the size small fit me. I found the dress to be flattering and relatively comfortable.
